Message.Title: penny king
Message.Msg: check out AHFD new coming

No real reason I can account for this surge. It could simply be TA driven....$12 is a (at least psychologically speaking) milestone. It hasn't really been conclusively north of this area in +1.5years. And in looking at a 1yr chart you could be forgiven for thinking BAC has just completed a cup-n-handle formation...with the handle leading up to Jan....then the left lip of the cup in January with a subsequent dip and now back up to the right edge of the cup which means it should spring from there...so far that's the set-up...could be a lot of folks TA is keying off the ~$12 line and adding impetus to the motion? ;-) Let's see how it goes both today and the remainder of the week. Highlow American Net'Zen

Topic.Title: why is this junk up to a 52 week high?

Message.Msg: Bank of America has $9.87 in CASH per share. Add in the value of the buildings/property they own, they are trading below breakup value. If someone bought the bank and broke it up they would get $20.24 per share. The stock has been trading at a depressed price due to the countrywide disaster and the roboforeclosures. With the news last week in FL Courts which will allow the banks to redo the roboforeclosures with no penalty to the bank. That is huge as it CUTS OFF Liability. Plus Bank of America is trading at only 9x PE which is low for this sector.
